description:
Platform engineering – lauded for its potential to revolutionise software development with automation, self-service, and streamlined workflows – appears to be falling short of expectations in the embedded software world. A new study by Forrester Consulting, commissioned by Qt Group, reveals a stark disconnect between the perceived maturity of platform engineering strategies and their actual... Read more »

The post Platform engineering is falling short of expectations appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Platform engineering is falling short of expectations
